# superheroR

[![lifecycle](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)

A R wrapper that can be used to pull data from the [SuperHero API](https://superheroapi.com) by specific superhero.
Entering the desired superhero you can information regarding a superheros powerstats, appearances, connections, and
much more. A Facebook profile is required to obtain a token.
